bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with a significantly swollen scrotum which, if pressed, appears harder than usual but is only mildly painful. One of various types of shan qi 疝氣 , elevation-illness qi. LSZ: this is often seen in children. Pu ji fang 普濟方 250: 治木腎，乳香、沒 藥、地膽、芫菁（去翅足） , “To cure wooden [external] kidneys , [take] ru xiang , mo yao , di dan , and yuan jing (remove wings and feet)”.
